source: TEXT_REGFSTETERNALCEREMONYSHOP_00219_CEREMONYSHOP01578_000_000<tab>If you're planning to hold a Ceremony of Eternal Bonding here at the Sanctum, I can furnish you with assorted items to make your special day as special as can be!
target:
TEXT_REGFSTETERNALCEREMONYSHOP_00219_CEREMONYSHOP01578_000_000セレモニーを彩る、特別な品々を取り扱っています！
ご購入できるのは、この大聖堂で、
「エターナルセレモニー」を開催される方だけです～！

source: TEXT_REGFSTETERNALCEREMONYSHOP_00219_SYSTEM_000_001<tab>The wares on offer are available only to those currently undertaking the quest “The Ties that Bind,” and who have yet to hold their ceremony. To accept this quest, you must possess a promise wristlet, which can be acquired via the Mog Station.
target:
TEXT_REGFSTETERNALCEREMONYSHOP_00219_SYSTEM_000_001このショップは、「エターナルバンド」を
申し込んだ方のみご利用いただけます。

source: TEXT_REGFSTETERNALCEREMONYSHOP_00219_CEREMONYSHOP01578_000_020<tab>You and your beloved were joined here at the Sanctum, were you not? I wish you all the best in your future together!
target:
TEXT_REGFSTETERNALCEREMONYSHOP_00219_CEREMONYSHOP01578_000_020「エターナルセレモニー」を開催された方ですねっ？
その節は、ありがとうございました～！

source: TEXT_REGFSTETERNALCEREMONYSHOP_00219_SYSTEM_000_021<tab>The wares on offer are available only to those currently undertaking the quest “The Ties that Bind,” and who have yet to hold their ceremony. To accept this quest, you must possess a promise wristlet, which can be acquired via the Mog Station.
target:
TEXT_REGFSTETERNALCEREMONYSHOP_00219_SYSTEM_000_021こちらは、「エターナルバンド」専用のショップです。
利用可能な期間は、エターナルセレモニー内の、
「誓約の儀」（指輪の交換）が終了するまでとなります。
